name: Bottle Shooting Center -The Obstacle Training Camp
name_original: Bottle Shooting Center -The Obstacle Training Camp
description:
Serve your country with pride and distinction. Train to be the best!

Here’s one of the best army training school game. Complete your drills, clear the hurdles and jump over the obstacles. Prepare yourself to go through US army training programmer. We’ve also made sure you don’t miss out on your target practice. So aim steady and shoot all those bottles away.

Love Shooting Games ? Be an expert shooter in this Bottle Game. The 3D effect of the game looks very realistic. You can shoot and break the bottles as many as you can within give time. Accuracy is the most important factor in any type of shooting, so you have to be very careful about it. If you like fun and addictive - Just aim and shoot!! Act as a shooter and breaker, create the wonderful shots, challenge yourself and your friends, and build up your high score. Let's see who will be the best shoot master in this realistic 3D game.


Your country needs you - now is not the time to shy away. Ten-HUT!!!
